title: Blockster
summary: A friend and I were bored during a night off at an undergraduate research conference (UROC) and decided we should try making a game.

title: Algomations
summary: I absolutely love math and algorithms but nothing rivals combining that with making them look nice. And so I make algomations where I learn a new algorithm (usually math related) and create an animation to show it!

title: Balance
summary: Neat little game you try to balance a stick on a cart.

title: Schools
summary: Just a fun pathfinding experiment. The overall goal is to create a deluanuy triangulation and have the user place blocks and obstacles. The "fish" or school will then pathfind as a group towards it, going around all obstacles.

title: This website
summary: I built this in an attempt to learn responsive design without using a framework, and also learn how to use angular.
